verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: hailed] [ARG1: his administration 's temporary truce with China on trade] , [ARGM-ADV: even as his Treasury secretary and China struck a note of caution on the latest agreement] .

President Donald Trump on Monday hailed his administration 's temporary truce with China on trade , even as [ARG0: his Treasury secretary and China] [V: struck] [ARG1: a note of caution on the latest agreement] .
